Text:
I don't know if this is the right forum to ask (and I'm not trying to spam here or anything)

what's up with "truthnews.info"
http://truthnews.info/correction/

does it mean that this archive will went down at the end?
http://2009.truthnews.info/news.php

I really hope not. there are some cool articles like
http://2009.truthnews.info/Ten-Swine-Flu-Lies-Told-by-the-Mainstream-Media
http://www.naturalnews.com/027055_swine_flu_vaccines_swine_flu_vaccine.html

?

abcd-she: thanks for your interaction, posts and inquiries. Ironically you should ask. Arrangements are being made to resume truthnews.info  --  maybe sometime around the first of the year.

Unfortunately truthnews.info's progenitor, TJ7, has not had the time to dedicate to the site's upkeep and maintanence. Please stay tuned and with a little luck you will see truthnews.info resurrected before too long.  :)

-
Are you looking for help with that project, sig?

I could probably contribute a little time, if you're interested.  It's a great site and I would like to see it continue.
-
sebaygo1 - would absolutely be interested in help. Will give a shout when arrangements are finalized. TIA.
